TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OdbcCommandBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class OdbcCommandBuilder Inherits DbCommandBuilder
public ref class OdbcCommandBuilder sealed : System::Data::Common::DbCommandBuilder

summary.span: 自动生成用于协调对 的更改与关联的数据源的单表命令。

span.span: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a with the associated data source.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会自动生成所需进行对帐对所做更改的 SQL 语句与数据源关联。The does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a associated with the data source. 但是，你可以创建对象，它通过设置生成 SQL 语句的单表更新属性。However, you can create an object that generates SQL statements for single-table updates by setting the property of the . 然后生成未设置任何其他 SQL 语句。The then generates any additional SQL statements that you do not set. 之间的关系和其对应始终是一对一。The relationship between an and its corresponding is always one-to-one. 若要创建这种对应关系，你可以设置属性对象。To create this correspondence, you set the property of the object. 这将导致将自身注册为侦听器，它将生成的输出影响事件。This causes the to register itself as a listener, which produces the output of events that affect the . 若要生成 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句，使用属性，以检索所需的元数据集。To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the uses the property to retrieve a required set of metadata. 如果你更改的值元数据进行检索，如第一次更新，然后，你应调用后方法来更新元数据。If you change the value of after the metadata has been retrieved, such as after the first update, you should then call the method to update the metadata. > [!NOTE] > 如果 SELECT 语句分配给属性使用别名列名称，生成的 INSERT、 UPDATE 和 DELETE 语句可能不准确或失败。If the SELECT statement assigned to the property uses aliased column names, the resulting INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements may be inaccurate or fail. 如果基础的 ODBC 驱动程序无法提供别名列名称的相应的基列名称 (使用 SQL_DESC_BASE_COLUMN_NAME 值`SQLColAttribute`)，无法生成 INSERT、 UPDATE 和 DELETE 语句中使用的别名。If the underlying ODBC driver cannot provide the appropriate base column name for the alias column name (using the SQL_DESC_BASE_COLUMN_NAME value of `SQLColAttribute`), the alias name could be used in the generated INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements. 例如，Microsoft ODBC Driver for Oracle 返回的别名名称作为基列名称。For example, the Microsoft ODBC Driver for Oracle returns the alias name as the base column name. 因此，生成的 INSERT、 UPDATE 和 DELETE 语句可能会导致错误。Therefore, the generated INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements would cause errors. 还使用， ，和属性引用的。The also uses the , , and properties referenced by the . 用户应调用如果修改一个或多个这些属性，或如果的值更改属性本身。The user should call if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the value of the property itself is changed. 否则为， ，和属性保留其以前的值。Otherwise the , , and properties retain their previous values. 如果调用、与解除关联，并且不再使用所生成的命令。If you call , the is disassociated from the , and the generated commands are no longer used. ## Examples 下面的示例使用以及和，来从数据源选择的行。The following example uses , together with and , to select rows from a data source. 该示例传递一个已初始化，连接字符串、 是一个 SQL SELECT 语句，查询字符串和是数据源表的名称的字符串。The example is passed an initialized , a connection string, a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the data source table. 然后，示例创建。The example then creates an . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcCommandBuilder/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcCommandBuilder/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将自己注册为侦听器由生成的事件此属性中指定。The registers itself as a listener for events that are generated by the specified in this property. 当你创建的新实例，任何现有与此关联释放。When you create a new instance of , any existing associated with this is released.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将自己注册为侦听器由生成的事件此属性中指定。The registers itself as a listener for events that are generated by the specified in this property. 当你创建的新实例，任何现有与此关联释放。When you create a new instance of , any existing associated with this is released.

param.name: command
param.span: 引用将从其中导出参数信息的存储过程的 。

span.span: The referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.

param.span: 将派生参数添加到 的 集合中。

span.span: The derived parameters are added to the collection of the .

summary.span: 从在 中指定的存储过程中检索参数信息并填充指定的 对象的 集合。

span.span: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the and populates the collection of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将覆盖任何现有参数信息。 overwrites any existing parameter information for the . 需要更多调用数据源以获取信息。 requires an additional call to the data source to obtain the information. 如果在提前知道参数信息，则更有效地通过显式设置的信息填充的参数集合。If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly. 你只能使用的存储过程。You can only use with stored procedures. 不能使用来填充使用任意 Transact SQL 语句，例如参数化的 SELECT 语句。You cannot use to populate the with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.

exception.span: 基础 ODBC 驱动程序不支持返回存储过程参数信息，或者命令文本不是有效的存储过程名称，或者指定的 不是 。

span.span: The underlying ODBC driver does not support returning stored procedure parameter information, or the command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the specified was not .

summary.span: 获取在数据源中执行删除操作所需的自动生成的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用方法为信息性或故障排除目的，因为它返回要执行对象。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 你还可以使用作为修改命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，你可能会调用和修改值，然后上显式设置。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 当首次生成 SQL 语句后，你必须明确地调用如果更改该语句以任何方式。After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则为仍将使用从上一条语句，这可能不是正确的信息。Otherwise, the still will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 应用程序调用时，将首先生成 SQL 语句或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用方法为信息性或故障排除目的，因为它返回要执行对象。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 你还可以使用作为修改命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，你可能会调用和修改值，然后上显式设置。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 当首次生成 SQL 语句后，你必须明确地调用如果更改该语句以任何方式。After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则为将使用从上一条语句，这可能不是正确的信息。Otherwise, the will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 应用程序调用时，将首先生成 SQL 语句或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 生成参数名称时的默认行为是使用@p1， @p2，有关的各种参数，依此类推。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 传递`true`为`useColumnsForParameterNames`参数允许你强制生成改为根据列名称的参数。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件，此操作将成功。This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定，并且其长度等于或大于生成的参数名。The has been specified, and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名满足中指定的条件正则表达式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - A指定。A is specified.

param.span: 当连接是通过时，会导致托管包装从获取 ODBC 驱动程序的引号字符，调用 SQLGetInfo （SQL_IDENTIFIER_QUOTE_CHAR）。

span.span: When a connection is passed, causes the managed wrapper to get the quote character from the ODBC driver, calling SQLGetInfo(SQL_IDENTIFIER_QUOTE_CHAR).

param.span: 如果连接未通过时，使用从 和 的值中引用该字符串。

span.span: When no connection is passed, the string is quoted using values from and .

summary.span: 给定了具有正确的目录大小写设置且不带引号的标识符时，返回该标识符的正确的带引号形式。

span.span: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.

summary.span: 这包括正确地转义该标识符中的任何嵌入引号。

span.span: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
The quoted version of the identifier.

returns.span: 标识符内的嵌入引号被正确地转义。

span.span: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.

span.span: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including correctly unescaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
